1�<Motheeer...Bring your power to this land once more!>8

]!��The complete set of mog tablets has been restored to Ru'Lude Gardens!The ancient magic of King Kupofried permeates the air to instill adventurers in this area with its Super Kupower
1�But Morimar and Darrcuiln aren't here yet.
1� , remember how I made you promise not to go on without me? What would it say about me if we went behind his back and did the same thing?
1�  and Arciela. How many moons has it been?
1�I see that one of your ragtag entourage is conspicuously absent.
1�No man is born into this world without sin. We all have darkness in our hearts--yet some tuck it away better than others.
1�Men are born into this world whole, but their spirits live on even as their bodies crumble into dust.
1�They float through time and space--some days, some weeks, some centuries--until they are eventually given life again.
1�Spirits never know release from their torment, all owing to the gloom that resides within each of us.
1�And what do they carry with them as they revive anew?Nothing. They are ethereal strings, stretching from existence to pointless existence.
1�Yet if we try to tie the ends together, to close the circle, we discover only that they extend farther than our hands can reach.
1�What is the purpose of life if its inevitable destination is despair?
1�I pity those lost souls who will never attain true awareness, and thus I have no choice but to snuff each lone candle out.
1�And once that task is done, I will rebuild a new, more natural order.
1�How is that evil? By bringing death, I create new life.
1�And the only way to save a spirit is to annihilate it.
1�Your much-lauded August was one such man. These anomalies across the ages are spiritual leaders, erudite sages, ferocious generals...and more.
1�Perhaps you are the same. Perhaps not.
1�Maybe you are a sign, sent to guide me on the right path. There are things that even someone with endless hosts like myself does not know.
1�Will you be the ones to open the gates to paradise?
1�Do the lot of you not realize how absurd this is? Surely you cannot mean to succeed.
1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, �[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.
1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.The Key to the Turris.Reckoning.Abomination(pt.1).Abomination(pt.2).
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.
1�This baffling gadget seems to serve as transport to the  �[lower/higher] floor
